claimRewards(address,uint256[]).details: Claim rewards from prediction platform and credit to user balance Users can call this directly or we can automate it

emergencyWithdraw().details: Emergency withdraw for admin (in case of critical bug)

executeCopyBet(address,address,address,u.details: Execute a copy bet on behalf of a follower Can only be called by approved operators (backend service)

getCopySettings(address,address).details: Get copy settings for a specific follower-trader pair

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Admin: Pause the contract in case of emergency

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setCopyFollow(address,uint256,uint256).details: Set or update copy trading settings

setPlatformApproval(address,bool).details: Admin: Approve or revoke a platform

stopCopyFollow(address).details: Stop copy trading a specific trader

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
